## Matrix4x4.divBy() method

Divide this matrix by a matrix component-wise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
divBy(other: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | The matrix that will be divide by. |
